name: Why isn't it being released?
reviewBody:
I've been searching for this movie everywhere. I heard that Ben Foster was in it, and I'm a big fan. So, I started looking for it and any information about it.

After reading the comments here, I realized the movie hasn't yet been released, even though it was supposed to be in 2003. I've only seen the preview on a french website. I haven't heard why it hasn't been released? I'm just wondering what's the hold up. It seems to be a really interesting film and I'd like to know more. Can't wait to see it.

Anybody?
